ExampleDefinition.Title: Rollover Feedback
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates using the BaseRenderableSeries.RolloverMarkerTemplate property and the RolloverModifier to add mouse-over feedback of data-points on multiple line series to the user
ExampleDefinition.Description:
<Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Rollover Feedback</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates using the BaseRenderableSeries.RolloverMarkerTemplate property and the RolloverModifier to add mouse-over feedback of data-points on multiple line series to the user.
An ItemsControl data-binds to a collection of RolloverModiifer.SeriesData.SeriesInfo objects, which contain:</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - The X,Y values of the series under the cursor.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - The series color.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - The series name</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">This can be used to create Active legends which update values as the user moves the mouse. For more information, see RolloverModifier and SeriesInfo in the help file.</Run>
